channel.title: Globus – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: ACTIVA 700
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
13 Face-Skin G-Pulse © – 60 Beauty – 58 Fitness – 53 Sport 21 Special Sports – 12 Tens – 3 Rehabilitation – 3 Incontinence 12 Microcurrents – 36 “3S” Serial Sequential Stimulation
ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES IN THE NEW 2013 RANGE Globus presents an innovative technology intended to revolutionize the electrostimulation application in beauty, sport and medical fields: 3S (Serial Sequential Stimulation) technology.
“3S” SERIAL SEQUENTIAL STIMULATION: The sequential contraction of the different muscular groups produces a deep pressure wave in the musculature involved causing the interstitial fluid drainage and enhancing the return of the venous blood to the heart.
FACE-SKIN TREATMENTS: ACTIVA 700 offers the new innovative and regenerative G-PULSE currents, proposed for Aesthetic and Beauty applications and able to regenerate the collagen production in the tissues.
G-TRODE HEAD: ACTIVA 700 is equipped with a special head that permits, using the G-PULSE programs, to obtain a more effective skin stimulation.
NEW TRENDY CARRYING CASE: ACTIVA 700 is supplied with a practical modern carrying case in aluminum and eco leather that can be carried in an easy way and that makes you feel always fashionable.
FACE AND BREAST AREA: ACTIVA 700 is equipped with a complete set of programs for face and breast toning
SPECIAL SPORTS: a special program list to stimulate in an effective and specific manner the muscular areas used in the more common sport activities.
MULTI-USER: it permits to store up to 10 different users and to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims.
AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): it permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation.
SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button.
RUN TIME FUCTION: this function permits to modify the time, the frequency and the pulse amplitude during the treatment
PROGRAMMABLE: 10 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. FAVORITES: it permits to store up to 15 programs for each user LAST 10: it stores the last 10 executed programs WORKING TIME: It indicates the total usage time of the device MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position on the display STIM LOCK
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 4 independent CHANNELS
Frequency: 0,3 – 150 Hz
Power: 120 mA per channel
Pulse amplitude: 40 – 450 μs
Wave form: Square, biphasic,
symmetrical, compensated
Power supply: rechargeable battery
Back-lit display
Device in II A class
In compliance with the directive
93/42/CEE-2007/47/CEE

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying case
1 ACTIVA 700 electrostimulator
1 G-Trode head
4 electrostimulation cables and 2
microcurrent cables
4 self-adhesive square electrodes and 4
self-adhesive rectangular electrodes
1 Gel bottle
1 Charger
1 Operating manual

item.title: B-MAT
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Bed Mat is a true mat made up of 4 interchangeable sections, each containing 4 solenoids. The Bed Mat has been devised to be placed on a traditional bed mattress, enabling users to perform magnetotherapy treatments during sleep. Bed Mat takes benefit from magnetic fields to treat the main musculoskeletal disorders such as arthrosis, osteoporosis, arthritis, etc.
item.content:encoded:
B-Mat is available in three versions:
 B-Mat 200 the mat is made up of two active sections containing 8 solenoids, and of two neutral sections without solenoids. The sections containing solenoids can be shifted to different body parts according to individual needs.
 B-Mat 300 The mat is made up of three active sections containing 12 solenoids, and of one neutral section without solenoids. The sections containing solenoids can be shifted to different body parts according to individual needs.
 B-Mat 400 the mat is made up of four active sections containing 16 solenoids.

item.title: DiaCaRe 1000 RT
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Heal your body by using inner energy and natural tissue and muscle self-regeneration mechanisms. This is the main principle of the therapy based on the new revolutionary diathermy technique (also known as TECARTHERAPY). Diathermy (TECARTHERAPY) works in either capacitive mode or resistive mode. DiaCaRe 1000 RT can work in resistive mode. Therefore, the biological effect will focus on the tissues with higher resistance more effectively (i.e. on the tissues that contain less water). DiaCaRe 1000 RT can work in resistive mode at a frequency of 470 KHz with a power of 50 W ac.
The portable DiaCaRe 1000 RT comes with an internal rechargeable battery which makes its use possible even without plugging it in. It is very practical for all those emergency situations where there is no electric outlet.
DIATRODE: unique in its category, this accessory permits the use of special electrode pads, directly applied on the part to be treated, maintaining the effectiveness of the therapy with no need for continuous operator assistance. Supplied.
MONOTRODE: this all-in-one handpiece permits to follow traditional application techniques but in a much simplified manner. There is no need to connect the return electrode, which is already contained in the same bipolar handpiece. Supplied.
DUALTRODE: accessory that consists of a monopolar handpiece and a return electrode pad. Not supplied.
INDICATIONS, APPLICATIONS Particularly indicated for the treatment of: osteoarthritis, bursitis, cervical arthrosis, chondropathy, contractures, contusions, sprains, strains, lesions, luxations, periarthritis, sciatica, ligament traumas, tendinitis.
REHABILITATION: treatment of all acute and chronic osteoarticular and muscular pathologies.
SPORT APPLICATIONS: to reduce and prevent traumas during athletic training, to favor recovery.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL CHARACTERISTICS
Power: 50 W ac
Outlets: 1
Handpieces: DiaTrode, MonoTrode
Output frequency: 470 KHz
Power supply: mains 220V 50/60 Hz or
rechargeable battery (supplied)
Dimensions: 17 x 22 x 6 cm
Backlit display
Coupling system: resistive
MDD-certified device

INCLUDED
1 Carrying case
1 Device DiaCare 1000 rt
1 DiaTrode cable
1 MonoTrode handpiece
4 DiaTrode S electrod pads
1 Manual
1 cream can
NOT INCLUDED
DualTrode handpiece

item.title: DiaCare 5000
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The Tecar Therapy is a form of endogenous thermotherapy that stimulates the body's natural repair processes, speeding up tissue recovery time during treatment of injuries and diseases of the musculoskeletal system. Diacare 5000 is the portable device of the Globus Tecar Therapy line and it is enriched with new features.
NEW GRAPHIC INTERFACE: to use the color touchscreen display in an intuitive way.
PRESET PROGRAMS: the new Diacare 5000 offers a list of preset programs to treat the most common disorders of the musculoskeletal system.
NEW PROGRAMS: ability to create new programs and save them in an appropriate memory.
AUTOMATIC TREATMENT: it allows the use of carbon electrodes to be fixed to the patient's body. In this way, the operator will have the opportunity to integrate therapy with manual techniques.
MULTI-FREQUENCY: Diacare 5000 can use different working frequencies. The ability to have multiple frequencies allows the operator to intervene in a timely manner on different tissues, even at different depths.
AUTOMATIC FREQUENCY SCANNING: the program allows, within the same treatment, to transport energy in an uniform way, before in the deeper tissues, then in the middle, and finally in the more superficial tissues.
TRANSDERMAL DELIVERY: the program allows to facilitate the absorption of the active principle of a drug or cream.
ATHERMY TREATMENTS: the athermic program, thanks to the pulsed controlled emission, is modulated to create a biostimulation of the tissue without generating heat.
PULSED TREATMENT: ability to use programs with pulsed emission of different ratio (duty cycle). This allows to maintain high the energy transferred to the tissues preserving, at the same time, a good temperature control.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Power: 200W ± 10%
Outputs: 2
Handpieces: 2
Treatment modality: capacitive and resistive
Output frequency: 400-470-700-1000 kHz ±10%
Size: 170x220x60 mm
Weight: 1,1 Kg

EQUIPMENT
1 Professional carrying case
1 Diacare 5000 device
1 Counter electrode (plate)
1 Monopolar resistive handpiece with 3 heads
of 30-50-70 mm Ø
1 Monopolar capacitive handpiece with 3
heads of 30-50-70 mm Ø
1 Operating manual
1 Power supply unit
1 Cream
1 DVD with treatment videos

item.title: DUO PRO
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: • 35 PROGRAMS FITNESS, HEALTH AND BEAUTY in the palm of your hand • BACKLIT DISPLAY • SOFT TOUCH FINISH: Duo Pro offers a pleasant feeling in your hands. Its coating makes it very soft. • EASY TO USE • ABILITY TO CUSTOMIZE TIME IN EACH PROGRAM • HIGH TECH & DESIGN: Duo Pro is a handheld stimulator with modern and innovative design, compact size, backlit display. • A FULL COMPLEMENT OF THE BEST PROGRAMS: To provide superior performance with ease of use. • SPORTS AND PERFORMANCE: 7 essential programs for training and sports performance. • FITNESS: 20 programs to achieve and maintain a perfect physical shape. The best solution to restore the balance and beauty of your body. • HEALTH AND WELLBEING: 8 specific applications for the treatment of pain, acute and chronic inflammatory disorders in the musculoskeletal system.
item.content:encoded:
SPECIFICATIONS
Channels: 2 independent channels
Frequency: 1 to 120 Hz
Power: 40 mA per channel
Pulse width: 50 to 320 μs
Waveform: square, biphasic, symmetrical
and balanced wave
Power supply: 3 batteries 1,5 V AAA
Device Class II Type BF

EQUIPMENT
1 bag
A stimulator PRO DUO
2 cables for connecting the electrodes
4 Square self-adhesive electrodes
4 Rectangular self-adhesive electrodes
1 Operating Manual
3 AAA Batteries

item.title: DUO TENS
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: 4 Fitness, Beauty, Wellness – 16 Pain –Tens Globus presents the new Duo Tens electrostimulator with a completely innovated design and performance. PROGRAMMABLE: Duo Tens has 6 free memories where it is possible to insert the desired parameters and to create your personalized programs. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button. PAIN: It eliminates the pain with the special pulses of the TENS currents that, stimulating your body in a soft way, enables you to recover your health, wellness and a renovated life enjoyment. FITNESS, BEAUTY & WELNESS: body beauty is the expression of a wellness state and a form balance that you have to value and defend from the attacks of time and sedentary life. With Duo Tens you can care for your body, defending its vitality and beauty using the main programs for physical shape.

item.title: ELITE SII
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
30 Sport - 44 Fitness, Beauty, Wellness – 16 Pain –Tens 6 Prevention – 3 Rehabilitation - 1 Incontinence Globus presents the new Elite SII electrostimulator with a completely improved design and performance.
PROGRAMMABLE: ELITE SII has 6 free memories where it is possible to insert the desired parameters and to create your personalized programs. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button. PREVENTION: 6 programs to reinforce main articulations and to prevent traumas and injuries. SPORT: EliteSII is programed to selectively stimulate fast and slow fibers in order to train different muscle qualities FITNESS, BEAUTY & WELNESS: Thanks to its compactness, lightness and power supply with rechargeable battery, Elite SII is the ideal tool to make an home exercise program to reach and maintain the physical shape. You can care for your body and defend its vitality and beauty with the electrostimulation beauty treatments. REHABILITATION & PAIN REHABILITATION: Muscle stimulation programs are particularly indicated for functional recovery after surgical articulation interventions and after immobilization time PAIN: It eliminates the pain with the special pulses of the TENS currents that, stimulating your body in a soft way, enables you to recover your health, wellness and a renovated life enjoyment. INCONTINENCE: one specific program to treat at home this common disorder.

item.title: EPILMAX G-LIGHT 500
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Epilmax G-Light 500 is the model of the well proven line of machines IPL Equipped with the new technology PULSED LIGHT. In addition to the traditional feature of removing undesired hair permanently, includes the very new Anti Age function.
HAIR REMOVAL FUNCTION
Laser epilation consists in the use of the laser energy for a definitive hair reduction . Epilmax G-Light emits a flash of very high intensity light energy that get absorbed by the hair’s melanin pigment, thus causing a fast overheating of the hair follicle. The heat destroys the dermal papilla (hair follicle), responsible of the hair’s growth.
REJUVENATION FUNCTION “Skin photorejuvenation” means a group of dermatological procedures that use specific high-intensity pulsed light sources (IPL), to generate corrective biological effects in the tissues altered by photoaging (sun damage), chronological ageing (age), and other gained alterations Epilmax G-Light can be easily carried and used in comfortably at home; it permits to reduce hair according to your needs, always and everywhere.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Bandwidth 470/1100 nm
Power output: 1,8J/cm (Rejuvenation)
Power output: da 3 a 5 J/cm2 (Epilation)
Lamps duration : 6000 flash (Epilation)
Lamps duration: 20.000 flash
(Rejuvenation)
Unit weight: 1.7 kg
Power supply: rete a 220V.

ACCESSORIES INCLUDED
1 IPL Unit
2 Xenon Lamps
1 Cable adapter
1 User’s manual
